headlines.text: Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump's Tariffs in Historic 6-3 Ruling
headlines.explanation: This happened on Feb 19, 2026. The Court ruled the president exceeded trade authority.

headlines.text: NASA Confirms Water Ice Deposits Found in Permanently Shadowed Lunar Craters
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While NASA has detected signs of water on the Moon, no such confirmation has been announced.

headlines.text: Artemis II Crew Enters Quarantine as NASA Targets March 6 Moon Launch
headlines.explanation: Real — the four Artemis II astronauts entered pre-flight quarantine in late February 2026.

headlines.text: EU Parliament Votes to Ban All Facial Recognition in Public Spaces by 2028
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While the EU AI Act restricts some biometric surveillance, no outright ban has been voted on.

headlines.text: Israel Strikes Kill at Least 10 in Lebanon as Ceasefire Frays
headlines.explanation: Real — Israeli strikes hit the Bekaa Valley in February 2026 amid ceasefire tensions.

headlines.text: Former Prince Andrew Arrested on Suspicion of Misconduct Linked to Epstein
headlines.explanation: Real — Andrew was arrested in February 2026 in a historic first for the British royal family.

headlines.text: OpenAI Announces Plans to Open-Source GPT-5 Core Model Weights
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. OpenAI has not announced open-sourcing any GPT-5 weights.

headlines.text: South Korea Sentences Ex-President Yoon to Life in Prison for Insurrection
headlines.explanation: Real — Yoon Suk-yeol was sentenced to life for his December 2024 martial law declaration.

headlines.text: Amazon Announces Plan to Replace 40% of Warehouse Workers with Robots by 2027
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While Amazon uses extensive automation, no such specific announcement was made.

headlines.text: Trump Signs New 10% Global Tariff Hours After Supreme Court Strikes Down His Trade Powers
headlines.explanation: Real — Trump signed a new executive order reimposing tariffs despite the Court ruling.

headlines.text: India's Reliance Bets $110 Billion on AI, Signaling a Global Power Shift
headlines.explanation: Real — Mukesh Ambani's Reliance announced a massive AI infrastructure investment in 2026.

headlines.text: Switzerland Votes to Ban Large Language Models in Government Decision-Making
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Switzerland has not held any such referendum or vote.

headlines.text: Rev. Jesse Jackson, Towering Civil Rights Leader, Dies at 84
headlines.explanation: Real — Jackson passed away in February 2026.

headlines.text: SpaceX Starship Completes First Successful Mars Orbit Insertion Test
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Starship has not attempted any Mars missions as of February 2026.

headlines.text: Nvidia and Meta Seal Multibillion-Dollar Chip Deal That Reshapes AI Hardware
headlines.explanation: Real — the deal was announced in February 2026.

headlines.text: Iran Warns of 'Decisive Response' as Trump Sets 10-15 Day Deadline for Nuclear Deal
headlines.explanation: Real — Trump gave Iran an ultimatum during the Geneva negotiations in February 2026.

headlines.text: Google DeepMind Achieves Breakthrough in Room-Temperature Superconductor Prediction
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. No such breakthrough has been announced by DeepMind.

headlines.text: Killing of Far-Right Activist Shakes France as 11 Arrested in Raids
headlines.explanation: Real — a far-right figure was killed in France in February 2026, triggering mass arrests.

headlines.text: Alysa Liu Wins Olympic Gold, Ending a 24-Year Drought for US Figure Skating
headlines.explanation: Real — Liu won gold at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

headlines.text: Japan's Central Bank Raises Interest Rates to 3%, Highest Since 1991
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While Japan has raised rates recently, not to 3%.

headlines.text: CERN Scientists Detect New Particle That Doesn't Fit the Standard Model
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. No such discovery has been announced by CERN.

headlines.text: Hungary and Slovakia Suspend Diesel Shipments to Ukraine in Escalation
headlines.explanation: Real — both countries suspended fuel deliveries amid EU tensions in February 2026.

headlines.text: Peru's President Ousted in Express Impeachment Over 'Chifa-Gate' Scandal
headlines.explanation: Real — Peru's president was removed from office in an unusually fast impeachment process.

headlines.text: Apple Cancels Vision Pro 2, Shifts AR Focus to Lightweight Glasses for 2027
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Apple has not announced cancellation of Vision Pro 2.

headlines.text: Iran Temporarily Closes the Strait of Hormuz in Provocative Military Exercise
headlines.explanation: Real — Iran briefly closed the strait during military drills amid tensions with the US.

headlines.text: Zuckerberg Testifies Under Oath: 'We Care Deeply About Safety'
headlines.explanation: Real — Zuckerberg testified in a landmark social media addiction trial in February 2026.

headlines.text: UK Government Proposes Mandatory AI Watermarking for All Online Content by 2027
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While AI watermarking is discussed, no such UK legislation has been proposed.

headlines.text: Trump's 'Board of Peace' Holds Inaugural Summit as Key Allies Skip
headlines.explanation: Real — Trump's new diplomatic initiative launched with notable absences.

headlines.text: Shiffrin Claims Slalom Gold as Winter Olympics Deliver Drama in Milan
headlines.explanation: Real — Mikaela Shiffrin won gold at the 2026 Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics.

headlines.text: WHO Declares New Mpox Variant a Public Health Emergency After Spread to 30 Countries
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. No new Mpox emergency declaration has been made in 2026.

headlines.text: Ukraine-Russia Geneva Talks End Without Breakthrough as Russia Demands NATO Withdrawal
headlines.explanation: Real — the Geneva peace talks stalled over Russia's demands in February 2026.

headlines.text: Tesla Recalls 2 Million Vehicles Over Autopilot Software Defect Linked to 47 Crashes
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While Tesla has had recalls, this specific one is not real.

headlines.text: Tarique Rahman Returns from Exile to Lead Bangladesh After Landslide Victory
headlines.explanation: Real — Rahman became Bangladesh's new leader after returning from exile in 2026.

headlines.text: Eight Skiers Found Dead in California's Deadliest Avalanche in Decades
headlines.explanation: Real — a massive avalanche near Lake Tahoe killed eight skiers in February 2026.

headlines.text: Brazil's Supreme Court Orders Nationwide Ban on X After Musk Refuses Data Compliance
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While Brazil and X have had disputes, no nationwide ban was ordered in 2026.

headlines.text: Trump Orders Pentagon to Release Classified Files on UFOs and Alien Contact
headlines.explanation: Real — Trump signed an executive order demanding declassification of UAP files.

headlines.text: China Launches First Crewed Mission to Its New Deep-Sea Station at 4,000 Meters
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. China has deep-sea ambitions but has not launched a crewed deep-sea station mission.

headlines.text: Erdogan Rejects Israel's Recognition of Somaliland, Warns of Regional Fallout
headlines.explanation: Real — Turkey's president condemned the move as destabilizing the Horn of Africa.

headlines.text: Boeing 737 MAX Cleared to Fly Again After FAA Lifts Global Grounding Order
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. No new global grounding of the 737 MAX has occurred in 2026.

headlines.text: Geneva Day Two: Witkoff Claims 'Meaningful Progress' But the Gaps Remain
headlines.explanation: Real — US envoy Witkoff reported progress in the Iran nuclear talks in Geneva.

headlines.text: US Military 'Ready to Strike Iran as Early as This Weekend,' Sources Say
headlines.explanation: Real — US officials leaked strike readiness during the February 2026 Iran tensions.

headlines.text: OpenAI Pauses ChatGPT Service for 12 Hours After Discovery of 'Alignment Drift'
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While AI safety concerns are real, no such incident occurred.

headlines.text: Nine Skiers Still Missing After Deadly California Avalanche Near Lake Tahoe
headlines.explanation: Real — rescue efforts continued for days after the February 2026 avalanche.

headlines.text: UNESCO Adds New York City's Central Park to World Heritage Site List
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Central Park is not on the UNESCO World Heritage List.

headlines.text: Ukraine-Russia Geneva Talks: Russia Demands Full NATO Withdrawal from Eastern Europe
headlines.explanation: Real — Russia's maximalist demands stalled the Geneva peace process.

headlines.text: Iran Holds New Military Drills as USS Abraham Lincoln Closes on the Gulf
headlines.explanation: Real — Iran conducted military exercises as US carrier groups moved into position.

headlines.text: India's Supreme Court Rules Caste Discrimination Illegal in Private Sector Employment
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While caste discrimination is debated, no such sweeping ruling has been issued.

headlines.text: Mikaela Shiffrin Announces Retirement from Professional Skiing After Olympic Gold
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Shiffrin won gold at the 2026 Olympics but did not announce retirement.

headlines.text: Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump's Tariffs in Historic 6-3 Ruling on Executive Trade Power
headlines.explanation: Real — the landmark February 2026 ruling limited presidential tariff authority.

headlines.text: France Arrests 11 in Connection with Far-Right Activist Killing as Tensions Rise
headlines.explanation: Real — French police conducted mass raids after the killing in February 2026.

headlines.text: Zuckerberg Admits Under Oath That Meta Prioritized Engagement Over Teen Safety
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While Zuckerberg testified about safety, he denied knowingly prioritizing engagement over teen safety.

headlines.text: Trump's 'Board of Peace' Holds Inaugural Summit as Key Allies Decline to Attend
headlines.explanation: Real — several major allies skipped Trump's new diplomatic forum.

headlines.text: Peru's Express Impeachment Sets Latin American Record at 47 Hours from Filing to Removal
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Peru's president was ousted quickly, but '47 hours' is an invented detail.

headlines.text: Alysa Liu Wins Olympic Gold, Ending a 24-Year US Figure Skating Drought
headlines.explanation: Real — Liu's victory was a historic moment at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

headlines.text: Rev. Jesse Jackson Lies in State at US Capitol as Nation Mourns Civil Rights Icon
headlines.explanation: Real — Jackson was honored at the Capitol following his death in February 2026.

headlines.text: South Korea's Constitutional Court Upholds Yoon's Life Sentence, Bars Future Pardon
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Yoon was sentenced to life, but no constitutional court ruling on pardons has been issued.

headlines.text: India's Reliance Commits $110 Billion to AI Infrastructure in Landmark Investment
headlines.explanation: Real — one of the largest AI investments by any non-US company.

headlines.text: Nvidia and Meta Seal Multibillion-Dollar Chip Deal Reshaping AI Hardware Supply
headlines.explanation: Real — the deal locked in massive GPU supply for Meta's AI ambitions.

headlines.text: WHO Confirms New Strain of Avian Flu Has Achieved Limited Human-to-Human Transmission
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. While avian flu remains a concern, no confirmed human-to-human transmission has been announced.

headlines.text: Bangladesh's Tarique Rahman Returns from 17-Year Exile to Become Prime Minister
headlines.explanation: Real — Rahman returned from exile in London to lead Bangladesh in 2026.

headlines.text: Iran Temporarily Closes Strait of Hormuz During Live-Fire Military Exercise
headlines.explanation: Real — Iran briefly closed the world's most critical oil chokepoint.

headlines.text: EU Announces Emergency Summit on Energy Security After Hungary Suspends Gas Transit
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Hungary and Slovakia suspended diesel shipments to Ukraine, but no EU emergency summit was called.

headlines.text: Former Prince Andrew Released on Bail After Historic Arrest Over Epstein Ties
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. Andrew was arrested, but the bail detail is invented.

headlines.text: Trump Signs Executive Order Demanding Pentagon Release All UFO and Alien Files
headlines.explanation: Real — part of Trump's broader transparency push on unidentified phenomena.

headlines.text: Eight Dead in California's Deadliest Avalanche as Climate Data Shows Snowpack Anomaly
headlines.explanation: Real — the Lake Tahoe avalanche was linked to unusual snowpack conditions.

headlines.text: Artemis II Launches Successfully as Four Astronauts Begin Journey Around the Moon
headlines.explanation: Fabricated (as of this puzzle date). Artemis II was in pre-launch quarantine, not yet launched.

headlines.text: Trump Reimposing 10% Global Tariff Despite Supreme Court Ruling Against Executive Trade Powers
headlines.explanation: Real — Trump defied the Court's ruling and signed a new tariff order.

headlines.text: Geneva Nuclear Talks Collapse as Iran Walks Out Over 'Impossible' US Demands
headlines.explanation: Fabricated. The talks were tense but Iran did not walk out.

headlines.text: Hungary and Slovakia Cut Diesel Supplies to Ukraine as Energy Becomes a Weapon
headlines.explanation: Real — fuel deliveries were suspended amid deepening EU divisions.

headlines.text: South Korea Sentences Former President Yoon to Life for Insurrection
headlines.explanation: Real — the historic sentence for Yoon's martial law declaration.
